cyclone.name: NICOLE
cyclone.current_location: about 555 miles east of the north-western Bahamas
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to slow, turn northwest today, then west-southwest toward the north-western Bahamas and the east-central Florida coast mid-week
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: east-central Florida coast (near Cape Canaveral–Treasure Coast area)
cyclone.hours_to_offshore: N/A (system never approaches the Virgin Islands)

weather_observation.watch_coast: A Tropical Storm Watch is in effect only for the north-western Bahamas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: North-western Bahamas, Florida east coast, and portions of the south-east U.S. coastline from Georgia to the Carolinas later in the week
weather_observation.expected_closest_date_to_port: Not expected to come close during the 5-day forecast period
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: SAN SALVADOR (Bahamas) – nearest point listed in wind-probability table
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-storm-force winds expected at St. Croix over the next 5 days
weather_observation.rainfall: No heavy rainfall associated with Nicole is forecast for St. Croix
